Feature.Name: Dwarven Thrower
Feature.Text: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It has the thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged attack using this weapon, it deals an extra 1d8 damage or, if the target is a giant, 2d8 damage. Immediately after the attack, the weapon flies back to your hand. Proficiency with a warhammer allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

MagicProperty.Requirement: Weapon (warhammer), very rare (requires attunement by a dwarf)
